data.name: Incubation
data.value: 數碼港培育計劃

data.name: Step_1_Profile
data.value: 申請人簡介及資格

data.name: Step_1_Q2
data.value: 您是否有可行的商業計劃確保您的產品或服務能於12至18個月內開始市場營銷?

data.name: Step_1_Q3
data.value: 於培育計劃申請截止日期時及培育期間，公司之創立團隊是否持有超過共51%的公司股權或擁有公司控制權？

data.name: Step_1_Q4
data.value: 您是否為香港註冊(或正在註冊成立)的科技有限公司，並截至本培育計劃申請截止日期時公司註冊期少於七年? (請於第5.1部分上傳公司註冊證書或申請證明文件，若您的公司正在註冊成立當中，註冊程序須於計劃申請截止日期起計30天內完成)

data.name: Step_1_Q5
data.value:
您已詳閱 數碼港培育計劃申請指引及指南，並確認任職於申請公司的主要申請人不得在下列公司以創辦人、共同創辦人或董事的身份工作:
(i) 現時經營於同一領域並參與由香港科技園公司，香港數碼港管理有限公司或香港設計中心所營運的培訓計劃（統稱為「香港培訓計劃」），或
(ii) 經營於同一領域並曾經參與及成功畢業於任何香港培訓計劃。

data.name: Step_1_Q6
data.value: 您現正提交申請數碼港培育計劃的項目或與之相似的項目有否在過去的18個月內申請或收到任何公營及 / 或私人機構/計劃的資金或資助？如回答“是”，請在下文第2.3.2.3節詳細列出。

data.name: Step_1_Q7
data.value: 您現正提交申請數碼港培育計劃的項目或與之相似的項目有否申請，或在未來18個月將會申請，或預期接受，任何公營及 / 或私人機構/計劃的資金或資助？如回答“是”，請在下文第2.3.2.3節詳細列出。

data.name: Step_1_Q8
data.value: 申請人是否有機會構成任何利益衝突? 如回答“是”，請在下文第2.3.2.4節詳細列出。

data.name: Step_1_Q9
data.value: 此申請是否過去曾提交到數碼港及 / 或其他公營機構的資助計劃？ 若是，請在下文第2.3.2.4節列明先前申請的項目並指出此申請與過去的申請的主要分別。

data.name: Step_1_Q10
data.value: 此申請是否過去曾提交到數碼港及 / 或其他公營機構的資助計劃？ 若是，請在下文第2.3.2.4節列明先前申請的項目並指出此申請與過去的申請的主要分別。

data.name: Step2_COMPANY_INFORMATION
data.value: 公司資料

data.name: Step_1_Q1
data.value: 您的創意概念與數碼科技範疇是否相關?

data.name: Step2_Company_Name
data.value: 公司名稱

data.name: Instruction_1
data.value: 於填寫申請時，遵守以下要求：

data.name: Instruction_1_1
data.value: 除非另有規定，請使用<mark>英語</mark>填寫申請;

data.name: Instruction_1_2
data.value: 將所有貨幣以<mark>港元</mark>填寫;

data.name: Instruction_1_3
data.value: 用<mark>繁體中文</mark>填寫中文信息;

data.name: Instruction_1_4
data.value: 當所需信息是不適用或無法使用時，填上<mark>“NA”</mark>;

data.name: Instruction_2
data.value: 遞交申請表格前，請先詳閱數碼港培育計劃申請指南及注意事項(ENC.RF.010)。

data.name: Instruction_3
data.value: 申請表格必須由申請人填寫。如果申請人是一家公司，表格必須由申請機構的董事或擁有人填寫。否則，將不獲處理。

data.name: Instruction_4
data.value: <mark class="mark-2">每個電郵帳戶只適用於提交一個數碼港培育計劃之網上申請。</mark>

data.name: Instruction_4_1
data.value:
如有任何查詢，請電郵至cip_enquiry@cyberport.hk.

請準備並上傳包括但不限於下列文件(如適用)：
  • 公司文件(如商業登記、公司註冊證書等)
  • 身份證明文件(如香港身份證、護照等)
  • 其他補充資料如公司組織結構、項目管理團隊個人履歷、圖像、圖表、商業計劃書等以闡述項目(如適用)等。


建議您準備1分鐘的視頻剪輯/演示文件/幻燈片播放來闡述項目(如適用)。請在下文第5.3節提供網址以下載有關檔案(如有)

data.name: Step_5_agree
data.value: 本人同意接收直接促銷資料。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration1
data.value: 申請人同意申請數碼港培育計劃之 “申請指南及注意事項” (ENC.RF.010) 內所有條款及條件。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration2
data.value: 所有申請表格及附上之文件內容均屬實，無誤導成分，並反映提交申請表格日期之事態。如有任何資料更改，申請人必會即時通知數碼港。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration3
data.value: 申請人爲本數碼港培育計劃申請表第2.4.1節中所描述的申請項目（「該項目」）的原創者，而該項目為原創的項目。 據本申請人所知， 該項目及將作為該項目一部份而開發的產品及/或服務並不是他人發展中或已完成的項目、產品及/或服務。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration4
data.value: 開發、發展及使用該項目及將作為該項目一部份而開發的產品及/或服務不會侵犯他人的權利或知識産權（不論有否註冊），包括但不限於專利、商標及版權。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration5
data.value: 除了申請人於本數碼港培育計劃申請表格第2.3.2.3節所述的資助計劃外，申請人（無論個人或作爲任何團隊的一員）沒有在過去的18個月內爲該項目申請或收到任何公營及/或私人機構/計劃的資金或資助; 亦不會在未來18個月爲該項目申請，或有資格接受，任何公營及/或私人機構/計劃的資金或資助。如申請人爲該項目申請或接受任何公營及/或私人機構/計劃的資金或資助，申請人必會即時通知數碼港，並按數碼港要求提供有關接受及使用資金或資助的證據。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration6
data.value: 申請人只會運用數碼港培育計劃資助資金於開發及發展該項目。 申請人不會與他人攤分或分享任何數碼港培育計劃資助資金，或運用數碼港培育計劃資助資金作出任何違法行爲或違反任何適用於向數碼港培育計劃申請資助資金的條款

data.name: Step_5_have_read
data.value: 作爲數碼港考慮及審批申請人有關數碼港培育計劃之申請的對價，申請人透過勾選此格確認同意及遵守以下細則:

data.name: Step_2_5_5_Note
data.value: 註:駐場培育公司須維持合理的辦公空間使用率， 在合約期間若使用率於任何3個月內未達到50%，則辦公空間之使用權將會被終止 。辦公空間將根據實際空缺情況作分配。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration7
data.value: 申請人明白此申請表中之資料將透露予獲授權之數碼港職員及評審委員會，以作初步審閱及評審之用途。數碼港或其獲授權之職員及評審委員會成員均不需與申請人簽署任何形式之保密協定。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration8
data.value: 申請人同意獲授權之數碼港職員可查閱已收取的資料以作申請手續之用途。

data.name: Step_5_Declaration9
data.value: 申請人確認若申請人團隊任何一員違反申請數碼港創意微型基金之 “申請指南及注意事項”、本數碼港培育計劃申請表及任何與數碼港所簽署的有關合約內的任何條款及細則，數碼港將有絕對權取消申請人的申請資格及索償已派發資助資金全額。 如任何違規事件可能涉及刑事成份， 數碼港將會交予相關執法機構跟進。

data.name: Step_6_Access
data.value: Access to and Correction of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Access_1
data.value: You have the right to request access to, and correction of, Your Data held by us. We may charge a reasonable fee for administering and processing your data access request. If you need to check whether we hold Your Data or if you wish to have access to, correct any of Your Data which is inaccurate, please write via e-mail to our Data Protection Officer at dpo@cyberport.hk or via mail to Level 6, Cyberport 2, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_1
data.value: means the community or development located at Telegraph Bay, Pokfulam including its offices, centres and arcade.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_2
data.value: We cannot use Your Data for direct marketing unless we have received your consent or indication of no objection. You may write to our Data Protection Officer or contact us via the contact information provided in our direct marketing materials to opt out from direct marketing at any time.

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing
data.value: Direct Marketing

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing_1
data.value: In connection with direct marketing, we intend to use your name and email address to market and promote the services, products, facilities, activities, contests, conferences, lucky draws, events and promotional campaigns from time to time available relating to us or "Cyberport", or shops or merchants or hotel in the "Cyberport" or offered or hosted at "Cyberport" (including consumer goods, food and beverages, books and stationery, children goods and services, fashion and accessories, optical products, watches, jewellery, luxurious goods, personal care, health and beauty products and services, furniture and lifestyle goods, home furnishing and appliances, florists, sports gear and products, electronic products and appliances, banking and financial services, cinemas and theatres, cultural, entertainment facilities and activities, charity activities, leisure activities and performances, gift redemptions and car parking facilities)

data.name: step_6_marketing
data.value: I agree to receive direct marketing information.

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
data.value: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_1
data.value: This Personal Information Collection Statement of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited ("us" or "we") applies to the personal data collected in this Cyberport Incubation Programme Application Form ("Personal Data").

data.name: step_6_personal_information_collection
data.value: l have read the Personal Information Collection Statement above.

data.name: Step_6_Privacy
data.value: Our Privacy Policy and Practices

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_1
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_2
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at http://www.cyberport.hk/en/privacy_policy for our general policy and practices in respect of our collection and use of personal data.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_3
data.value: communicating with you if we have any/or question and update about your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_4
data.value: providing updates, services, products, facilities or activities and matters relating to our administration, management, operation and maintenance;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_5
data.value: designing, reviewing, evaluating and enhancing our services, products, facilities or activities (including conducting research, survey and analysis for those purposes);

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_6
data.value: direct marketing (please see "Direct Marketing" section below); and

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_7
data.value: handling complaints, legal, safety and security purposes.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_8
data.value: It is mandatory to provide the requested personal data, or we will not be able to process your application.

data.name: STEP_6_STATEMENT
data.value: This Statement is written in the English language and may be translated into other languages. In the event of any inconsistency between the English version and the translated version of this Statement, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Step_6_Title_Principal_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data
data.value: Transfer of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_1
data.value: Your Data will not generally be disclosed or transferred to any other party in a form that would identify you, except in the following circumstances:

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_2
data.value: If we use third party suppliers or service providers who provide services to support our business operation or facilitate provision of our services, products, facilities or activities, we may provide Your Data to these suppliers or service providers.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_3
data.value: We may disclose Your Data to any governmental or law enforcement agency, judicial body or regulatory authority to whom we are required to make disclosure according to any law, regulation, court order, direction, code or guideline.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_4
data.value: In addition, Your Data may be accessed by, disclosed or transferred to any person under a duty of confidentiality to us (including our accountants, auditors, legal advisers or other professional advisers) for the purposes described in the "Purpose and Use of Your Data" section above.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_note
data.value: As the parties mentioned above may be located outside Hong Kong, Your Data may be transferred out of Hong Kong.

data.name: Question_1_1_Note
data.value: 注意你不符合申請資格: 您的創意概念需要與數碼科技範疇相關。

data.name: Question_1_1_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.1 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_2_Note
data.value: 注意你不符合申請資格: 您需要有可行的商業計劃確保您的產品或服務能於12至18個月內開始市場營銷。

data.name: Question_1_2_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.2 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_3_Note
data.value: 注意你不符合申請資格: 於培育計劃申請截止日期時及培育期間，閣下公司之創立團隊須持有超過共51%的公司股權或擁有公司控制權。

data.name: Question_1_3_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.3 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_4_Note
data.value: 注意你不符合申請資格: 你需要於香港擁有註冊(或正在註冊成立)的科技有限公司，並截至本培育計劃申請截止日期時公司註冊期少於七年。

data.name: Question_1_4_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.4 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_5_Note
data.value: 注意你不符合申請資格: 任職於申請公司的主要申請人不得在下列公司以創辦人、共同創辦人或董事的身份工作: 現時經營於同一領域並參與由香港科技園公司，香港數碼港管理有限公司或香港設計中心所營運的培訓計劃（統稱為「香港培訓計劃」），或經營於同一領域並曾經參與及成功畢業於任何香港培訓計劃。

data.name: Question_1_5_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.5 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Step_4_Nationality
data.value: 國家/地區

data.name: CI_Reminder
data.value: 若公司名稱曾經更改，請於下方第5.5部分上傳以往的公司註冊證書。

data.name: Question_1_8_1
data.value: Please select yes / no in the required field: Question 1.9

data.name: Step_1_Q8_1
data.value: 您現正提交申請數碼港培育計劃的項目或與之相似的項目有否申請同一招募的數碼港創意微型基金？如回答“是”，香港數碼港管理有限公司只會考慮您於現招募提交的數碼港培育計劃申請，而不另行通知。
